actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources

official_title: To withdraw certain Federal lands and interests located in Pima and Santa Cruz counties, Arizona, from the mining and mineral leasing laws of the United States, and for other purposes.
short_title: Southern Arizona Public Lands Protection Act of 2018

summary.text:
Southern Arizona Public Lands Protection Act of 2018

This bill withdraws federal lands and interests located in Pima and Santa Cruz Counties, Arizona, as well as all federally owned subsurface interests under the administrative jurisdiction of the Bureau of Land Management (BLM) in lands in Pima County, from: (1) all forms of entry, appropriation, and disposal under the public land laws; (2) location, entry, and patent under the mining laws; and (3) operation of the mineral leasing and geothermal leasing laws, and the mineral materials laws.

The bill also withdraws all federally owned interests in BLM lands in Pima County from entry, location, or patent under the general mining laws.

titles.title: Southern Arizona Public Lands Protection Act of 2018
